title: Prince William Forest Park: Public Involvement
body: Public Involvement       Public comment and involvement is integral to the future success of this park and all units of the National Park Service. This page provides the public with notification of open public comment periods on Environmental Assessment (EA), Environmental Impact Statements (EIS), and other important planning documents.          Public Comment - 8/31/2009 - 9/19/2009 Rehabilitate 14 Historic Cabins in Cabin Camp 4 Short Form EA (3.6MB)        Scenic Drive in Autumn. NPS Photo.  Public Comment Needed: 6/24/2009 - 8/15/2009 Resurface Public Roads and Parking Lots EA Document Summary Full EA (8.9 MB - pdf)      How do I comment? To ensure easy access to planning documents, the National Park Service created PEPC, the Planning, Environment, and Public Comment system.  Please visit PEPC to leave us with your useful comments.
